org.digijava.kernel.lucene

Class LuceneWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.lucene.LuceneWorker

  • public class LuceneWorker
extends java.lang.Object
    Lucene worker contains general code for working with Lucene. It is oriented on AMP modules hence name of items it works with is LucModule. For example Translation implements this interface in LucTranslationModule. If we want add new type of objects to index, then we should implement module for those type and provide specific information through this new implementation. Then we should add this module in static initializer section of this worker.
    See Also:
    LucModule

      • search

        public static <E> AmpLuceneTopDocs search(java.lang.Class<E> clazz,
                                          java.lang.String textToSearch,
                                          javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
                                          java.lang.String suffix)
                                   throws DgException
        Search items in index. Module (index to be searched) is determined from clazz parameter and classNameSuffix. Use classNameSuffix if you have separate indexes for same class.

        E -
        Parameters:

        context -
        classNameSuffix - suffix for classes to separate them by some feature in different indexes.

        DgException
